title: Why Do We Celebrate Halloween?
description: Why do we celebrate Halloween? Who created this holiday? Where do pumpkins come from and why do we carve them? This week we're answering your Halloween questions with a professor of all kinds of scary and creepy things, Regina Hansen of Boston University.
itunes:subtitle: Why do we celebrate Halloween? Who created this holiday? Where do pumpkins come from and why do we carve them?
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
